description: This week, Chris and Ethan chat about how they started incorporating different genres on the page, the 'Midnight Special' phenomenon, why cover songs are absolutely awesome, and whether or not six feet really isn't so far down. Support the podcast directly by becoming a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/grunge_bible​
html_description:
This week, Chris and Ethan chat about how they started incorporating different genres on the page, the 'Midnight Special' phenomenon, why cover songs are absolutely awesome, and whether or not six feet really isn't so far down.


Support the podcast directly by becoming a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/grunge_bible​
name: Episode 3: "Hey, This Isn't Grunge!"

show.description: Join Chris Celona and Ethan Shalaway as they discuss all things music and 90s ‘grunge‘ rock, with discussions of stories, albums, lyrics, artists, as well as interviews, questions, and answers.  Produced by Drew McFadyen.
show.html_description:
Join Chris Celona and Ethan Shalaway as they discuss all things music and 90s ‘grunge‘ rock, with discussions of stories, albums, lyrics, artists, as well as interviews, questions, and answers.
Produced by Drew McFadyen.
show.name: The Grunge Bible Podcast
